name: Friday night funkin's game maker edition
name_original: Friday night funkin's game maker edition
description:
==================================

Game Testers Wanted

(and your name will pay off in the game)

==================================

(I will be updating the publication with each advance)

You want to play Friday Night Funkin' but it gets hung up.

You Want To Play Friday Night Funkin' But Your PC Explodes.

Don't Worry Today I Bring You The Solution

It's ... Literally Friday Night Funkin' But It's Made In Game Maker Studio 1

(It's Not A Mod It's A Fan-Game)

BUT With Added Extras Like:

1- More Characters To Play: Example: Kirby (Maybe)

2-It will be 100% with sprites

3-Will have the original OST

4-Mods? (Or Skins)

Example:

And something else that occurs to me:

5-Multiplayer? (I don't know, I'm not good at programming)

6-Battle Mode? (I don't know, I'm not good at programming)

Here Are Some Imagesnes Of The Sprites (Maybe At The End They Change A Little)
